login.pleaseregister: Please fill the form to register
login.pleaselogin: Please log in to use the system.
login.user_helper: If you haven't yet got an user account, please register first.
login.registered: You have been succesfully registered. Please, look at your e-mail inbox. You'll receive an email to confirm your account.
login.register_error: There was an error creating your account. Please, try again with different values.
login.login_error: An error has occurred. Please check your credentials and try again.

verification.title: Verification
verification.error: An error has occured while verificating
verification.successful: Thank you, {{user}}, for verifying your e-mail.
verification.failed: We are sorry, {{user}}, your verification has failed. Try again with the link you received by email.

errorocurredfetching: An error has ocurred while fetching this data, please try again
